name: The story of the endless nothing
name_original: The story of the endless nothing
description:
Help the protagonist to get rid of the vortex in their head.
Walk to the right to meet several characters, in this order: some little houses, a couple of big houses, some eyes planted in the ground, a disappearing king-tucan, an-eye throwing shaman, a pirates' vessel, some trees, a crying figure, a big vortex.

Move your arrows to go forward, back, and jump.
Recommended browser: Google Chrome. If you use Firefox you need to left click with your mouse to play the music, for some weird reason.
Expected playing time: 1-2 minutes

Enjoy :)
